english_translation: In the reading of Abdullah ibn Abbas: Regarding the verse 'so that some of them take others in mockery' (Quran 43:32): He said - servants. Regarding the verse 'If We had made for those who disbelieve the Most Merciful silver roofs' (Quran 43:33): He said - beams. Regarding the verse 'and for climbing stairs by which they ascend' (Quran 43:33): He said - steps. Regarding the verse 'and adornment' (Quran 43:35): He said - gold.
